name: patch
desc: This command line is used to fix problems with software or systems.

-p.name: Specify the package or system path to be repaired

-s.name: Quiet mode: only display error messages

-f.name: Force repair: repair even if it is not safe

content:
Example

Fix a package:

patch -p /path/to/package

Quiet mode:

patch -p /path/to/package -s

Force repair:

patch -p /path/to/package -f
